body:
I am not making a special video for 300 subs but I still wanted to do something to celebrate it. So I decided to do another AMA! If I get over 20 questions I might make it into a video... Who knows!

ASK AWAY!
body_tagged:
I am not making a special video for 300 subs but I still wanted to do something to celebrate it. So I decided to do another AMA! If I get over 20 questions I might make it into a video... Who knows!

ASK AWAY!
title: 300 SUB AMA!

replies.body:
Hello sa unsa nga paagi ang imong adlaw ?
And
How does it feel having 300?

replies.body:
What has been your favourite moment as a YouTuber so far? :)
Congrats Tynvale!

replies.body: It feels AMAZING having 300+ subs supporting me and what I do!

replies.body:
My (2) favourite moments would be:
- Coming home to see my Ali-A videos with 300+ the day I uploaded it!
- Seeing my Avicus videos do so well!
